title: HOW to KEEP your CHICKENS WATER from FREEZING OFF-GRID HACK

tasks.task: Check if chicken water is frozen using a saltwater solution.
subtasks: Gather ingredients (quarter cup salt, water, rock salt).
Mix salt with lukewarm water.
Insert saltwater bottle into chicken water container.
Monitor water over several days, checking temperature conditions.
Wait for cold weather (approx. nine degrees Fahrenheit).
Check for ice buildup in chicken water.
Assess the effectiveness of the saltwater solution.
